mapper.insert: insert into t_xcx_volunteer_team (uuid, name, type, service_type, recruit_starttime, recruit_endtime, service_time, join_type, introduction, create_time, update_time ) values ( #{uuid}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{service_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recruit_starttime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{recruit_endtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{service_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{join_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now() )
mapper.select:
select uuid,name,type,(select name from t_xcx_type_detail where uuid = type) type_name,create_time from t_xcx_volunteer_team
1=1
and name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and type = #{type}
order by create_time desc

select t.uuid,t.name,t.type,(select name from t_xcx_type_detail where uuid = t.type) type_name, t.recruit_starttime,t.recruit_endtime,t.service_time,t.join_type,t.introduction,t.create_time,t.update_time, p.uuid picture_uuid, p.name picture_name,p.url picture_url from t_xcx_volunteer_team t left join t_xcx_vteam_picture p on t.uuid = p.volunteer_team_id where t.uuid=#{uuid}
mapper.update:
update t_xcx_volunteer_team
name = #{name},
type = #{type},
service_type = #{service_type},
recruit_starttime = #{recruit_starttime},
recruit_endtime = #{recruit_endtime},
service_time = #{service_time},
join_type = #{join_type},
introduction = #{introduction},
update_time =now()
where uuid=#{uuid}
mapper.select: SELECT team.type FROM t_xcx_volunteer_team team, t_xcx_vteam_user vu WHERE vu.user_id =#{user_id} and vu.flag = 1 and vu.volunteer_team_id = team.uuid
